questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: if I had 1 million euros, I think I will put half on an acount for my futur life and never use it before I had to buy a new car, a house, pay for my childs cursus. I think I will use the half of wat it left to make gift to my family. Bring my parents in vacation to Corse because they have always love this country. I will pay to my brother computer parts so that we could build it toegether.
